text: Max Simon is the name of the following persons: * (1814–1872), German jurist and member of the Reichstag * Max Simon (mathematician) (1844–1918), German mathematician and historian of mathematics * (1884–1950), German teacher and politician (SPD) * Max Simon (1899–1961), German SS-Gruppenführer and lieutenant General of the Waffen-SS * (born 1919), German politician (NDPD)
title: Max Simon (disambiguation)
